casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth W. BATES. No. 456P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 22, 2005. Kirby H. Smith, III, New Bern, for Kenneth William Bates. C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

*199"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of August 2005."
